title: 배성우
content:
배성우는 서울캠퍼스
공과대학

장을 겸임하고 있다.

학력
2011.12    Ph.D., Electrical and Computer Engineering (Energy System), The University of Texas at Austin, USA
2009.05    M.S.E., Electrical and Computer Engineering (Energy System), The University of Texas at Austin, USA
2006.02    B.S.E.E, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea

2019.09 ~ Present    Associate Professor, Hanyang Univerisity
2017.09 ~ 2019.08    Assistant Professor, Hanyang Univerisity
2013.03 ~ 2017.08    Assistant Professor, Yeungnam Univerisity
2012.06 ~ 2013.02    Senior Engineer, Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology
2012.01 ~ 2012.04    Postdoctoral Research Fellow, The University of Texas at Austin, USA
